project_descr: The project aims to assist the country in implementing its relevant obligations under the Stockholm Convention to reduce the releases of Unintentional POPs emissions and to build country’s capacity to manage chemicals and waste.

outputs.output_descr: The project aims to assist the country in implementing its relevant obligations under the Stockholm Convention to reduce the releases of Unintentional POPs emissions and to build country’s capacity to manage chemicals and waste.

document_name: NIP update, integration of POPs into national planning and promoting sound healthcare waste management in Kazakhstan
project_title: belize chemicals and waste management project
